text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka's training is<n>proceeding well, though today<n>
something else seems to be on her<n>mind.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Phew. A 0.1-second improvement. Ifonly everything could go as smoothlyas my running... Sigh...
choice_data_list:
Was there an issue with some of the other
training?

Was there an issue with some of the other
training?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh, no. It's not training that's the<n>issue.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
There's actually a fan event this<n>weekend that I'm a bit
worried about...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've only ever focused on running, so<n>I'm not really used to
anything else.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't think of a response the last<n>time a fan tried to
speak with me. It<n>was like the room was spinning, but it<n>
turns out...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I was the one spinning. There was<n>even a magazine article
about how I<n>just started veering left, walking in a<n>little
circle whenever somebody talked<n>to me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I can't help but feel anxious about<n>fan events now... What if
I do<n>something silly again?
choice_data_list: Sounds like you get quite worked up.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, I suppose I do kind of let that<n>happen.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I don't want to resign myself to doing<n>these things
half-heartedly... But at the<n>same time, I don't feel like I can
do it<n>well.
choice_data_list: Want to try practicing for it with me?
Want to try practicing for it with me?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huh? You mean practice... with you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, in order to help prepare her<n>for social events, I take
on the role of<n>an enthusiastic Suzuka fan.
choice_data_list: Your latest race was amazing! Your best ever!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh... This might be harder than I<n>thought.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Umm... To say my race was amazing...<n>That's quite a
compliment.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And "best ever"? You must have<n>been watching my races
for quite<n>some time... Right...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you very much.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Um, that's all.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Don't try to make me feel better. It's<n>just like I thought...
it's far too late to<n>try to improve my social skills...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I don't think I could ever be as<n>talkative as Fukukitaru is
about<n>fortune telling, or adapt to any kind of<n>conversation
like Taiki can.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Hopefully I can manage to force a<n>smile and say something
at least<n>somewhat interesting.
choice_data_list:
I'll prepare a little treat for you after it's all
done.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A treat?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The weekend comes fast, and we<n>find ourselves at the fan
event.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Wow... I feel almost as tense as<n>before a race, but in a
completely<n>different way.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I'm definitely still a little worried about<n>messing up... But
yeah, I'll do my<n>best.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. Into the crowd I go. I'll be<n>looking forward to
that treat, then.

text_block_list.name: Suzuka Fan
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka, I'm always rooting for you!<n>You've been getting
better with every<n>race lately!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, thank you! I'll make sure from<n>now on to um... Uh...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Oh! I'm privileged to have you<n>appreciate all the little ways
I've<n>improved.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And um... Umm...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I watch her give it her all amongst the<n>throngs of fans for a
while before<n>setting out to procure the treat she<n>chose.

text_block_list.name: Sweets Shop Staff
text_block_list.text:
The end of the queue for the Royal<n>Honey Carrot Tart is
here! The wait<n>time is 140 minutes!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I line up at a popular cake shop in the<n>nearby shopping mall.
It probably<n>won't actually take 140 minutes...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Four hours... Did you really have to<n>wait here that long?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I guess the tarts have to cool<n>down after they're done
baking too...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um, I'm really sorry. I couldn't think<n>of a treat I wanted
myself, so I just<n>asked for the one everyone at the<n>
academy was talking about...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But you know, it really did motivate<n>me to do my best at the
fan event.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I mean... It's not like I was able to<n>respond to everyone
thoughtfully. But<n>you know...
choice_data_list: You managed to keep a positive attitude?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, I did! Much more so than usual,<n>at least.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Before now I would always be<n>overcome with worry about
saying or<n>doing something embarrassing...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Knowing that there was a treat<n>waiting for me at the end
allowed me<n>to simply do my best and work<n>toward it.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It became like a sort of finish line for<n>me. So I approached it
as such.
choice_data_list:
And sweets taste even better after working hard
for them.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I can't wait to try it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka wears a satisfied<n>expression on her face
after tackling<n>the day's unfamiliar challenge.
